user.name: Veloi
user.short_description: I'm a skilled React developer with expertise in TypeScript and React Native, dedicated to crafting delightful user experiences.
user.description:
I'm a software engineer based in the Philippines. I'm currently working at [Ayala Land](https://www.ayalaland.com.ph) as a full-stack developer.
I'm passionate about building software that helps people. I'm also interested in open-source software, web development, and design.
I'm currently learning [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/) and [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/).
